name: FGTnetwork
tag_list: network, local, global, trade, experts, consulting, consultations, fast-growing-markets, services
overview:
FGT Network is the leading remote consulting platform dedicated to business development in fast-growing cities (Shanghai, Bangkok, Singapore, Mumbai, New Delhi, SÃ£o Paulo, etc). FGT delivers local market information to support business development to these remote markets.

On FGT Network, experienced industry professionals (directors, managers, business owners), based in the main fast-growing cities worldwide, share, besides their job, their local business expertise with European decision makers willing to expand their business.

Consultations are carried out through phone or synthetic reports. Our turnkey platform offers a secured and controlled environment, with full management of intermediation.

We provide support to our experts on methodological matters (to help them improve the quality of their consultations), and also on administrative & legal aspects (billing, insurance, contractualization, legal obligations).
